*.description: May see and clone all repositories
May see, clone and push to all repositories
May see, clone, push to, configure and delete all repositories
May administer permissions (additionally needs 'administer users' and/or 'administer groups').

list.description: Prerequisite for all other administration permissions. Without this, no configuration will be visible.

global.description: May configure core settings of SCM-Manager

*.description: May configure settings of SCM-Manager core and all plugins

read,write.description: May create, modify and delete custom repository roles and their permissions

read.description: May see all installed and available plugins

read,write.description: May see and manage all installed and available plugins

read.description: May see the repository inside the SCM-Manager

modify.description: May modify the basic properties of the repository

push.description: May change the content of the repository (push/commit)

permissionRead.description: May see the permissions of the repository

permissionWrite.description: May modify the permissions of the repository

*.description: May change everything for the repository (includes all other permissions)

AGR7UzkhA1.description: The requested entity could not be found. It may have been deleted in another session.

FtR7UznKU1.description: There is already an entity with the same key values.

9BR7qpDAe1.description: You do not have the permission to change the password.

2wR7UzpPG1.description: The entity has been modified concurrently by another user or another process. Please reload the entity.

9SR8G0kmU1.description: The version control system for this repository does not support the requested feature.

CmR8GCJb31.description: The server encountered an internal error. Please contact your administrator for further assistance.

92RCCCMHO1.displayName: An internal URL could not be found
92RCCCMHO1.description: An internal request could not be handled by the server. Please contact your administrator for further assistance.

2VRCrvpL71.description: The data sent to the server could not be handled. Please check the values you have entered or contact your administrator for further assistance.

8pRBYDURx1.description: The data sent to the server had an illegal data type. Please contact your administrator for further assistance.

1wR7ZBe7H1.description: The values could not be validated. Please correct your input and try again.

3zR9vPNIE1.description: The values could not be validated. Please correct your input and try again.

CHRM7IQzo1.description: The change failed. Please contact your administrator for further assistance.

thbsUFokjk.description: A identifier value has been changed in the entity. This is not allowed.

40RaYIeeR1.description: No changes were made to the files of the repository. Therefor no new commit could be created. Possibly changes cannot be applied due to an .ignore-File definition.

4iRct4avG1.description: The revisions have unrelated histories. Therefor there is no common commit to compare with.

65RdZ5atX1.description: Some files to cancel the plugin (un)installation could not be deleted. This can lead to inconsistencies so that the SCM-Manager cannot restart properly. Please check the logs and clean up the plugin folder manually. To cancel the installation of a plugin, remove the corresponding smp file. To cancel the uninstallation, remove the file named 'uninstall' inside the directory for this plugin.

6eRhF9gU41.description: The selected merge strategy is not supported by the repository.

78RhWxTIw1.description: The default branch of a repository cannot be deleted. Please select another default branch first.

1yRiASshD1.description: The anonymous user cannot be deleted since the anonymous access is still enabled in the configuration.

DURjbJVOb1.description: The checksum of the downloaded plugin does not match the expected checksum from the plugin center. Please check the plugin center configuration.

8lRjbIQM51.description: The plugin could not be downloaded. Please check the log for further information.

G1RjbJAJV1.description: There were errors during the plugin installation. The plugin directory could not be cleaned up afterwards. A restart could result in unpredictable results. Please check the log for further information.
